dialogue.htmlContent: In your peripheral vision, you suddenly see a figure swooping down towards you from high up above. Turning towards them, you ready yourself for a fight, and within just a moment, [npc.a_fullRace(true)] lands just in front of you.

[npc.speech(Well, well, well!)] [npc.she] states, placing [npc.her] [npc.hands] on [npc.her] [npc.hips+] and striking a confident pose. [npc.speech(A trespasser! What kind of business do you have down here?!)]

Before you can even start to answer, the talkative [npc.race] continues chattering away, [npc.speech(So you thought you'd just waltz right into my territory, hmm? I mean, not that it's really my territory, there are loads of us living up in the roosts, but I mean that this is the place that I call home. And you came walking past, obviously up to no good, and so I thought to myself, 'Hmmm, that person looks like they're up to no good!'. And so then I swooped down to see who it was, and it was you! And I can just tell from looking at you that you're up to no good, so then I thought, 'Hmmmmmm, I'd better put them in their place!'. Y'know what I mean? I can't just be watching you walk past and choose not to do anything! That would make me, like, irresponsible or something! So now I'm here, and you're there, and I'm gonna have to teach you a lesson! My friends and I were talking about this sort of thing just the other day, y'know? We were saying how we can't just let people go without trying to confront them first! So here I am, confronting you! And now you're going to have to pay me. Yes, that's right, pay me! Five hundred flames, to be exact! So you pay me, or else I'm gonna make you pay! Funny how that works, huh? Anyway, what's it going to be? I tried to keep this brief, as I'm very busy right now, so I'd appreciate it if you could do the same. Just hand over your money, and that'll be that, ok?)]

With [npc.name]'s fast-paced rant finally at an end, you're given a moment in which to think about your situation. You can tell that [npc.name] is willing to fight you in order to get some money, so you could choose to defend yourself, or just hand over the cash that [npc.she]'s asking for...

#IF(pc.isCowardly()) Wanting to avoid a fight if at all possible, you take a step backwards, fumbling about to grab a handful of flames to offer to [npc.name]. [pc.speech(I don't want to fight! Please, just take my money and leave me alone!)] #ELSE #IF(pc.isConfident()) Not wanting to waste your time dealing with this pathetic [npc.race], you produce a handful of flames, before confidently stepping forwards and holding them out to the mugger. [pc.speech(Count yourself lucky that I've got far more important things to do than waste my time on a miserable wretch like yourself!)] #ELSE Not wanting to get caught up in a fight with this [npc.race], you decide to take the safer route, and offer [npc.herHim] a handful of your flames. [pc.speech(Here's your money. Now step aside and let me pass.)] #ENDIF #ENDIF

[npc.speech(Good, that's good!)] [npc.name] replies, stepping forwards and holding out [npc.her] [npc.hands]. [npc.speech(So hand it over, ok? I need that money, or else I'll have failed to confront you! And I can't go back to my friends and say that, now, can I? So give me the money! That's right, five hundred flames!)]

Wanting to put an end to the [npc.race]'s incessant chattering, you quickly give [npc.herHim] the five hundred flames. As soon as you've handed the money over, [npc.she] lets out a happy little giggle, before sneering, [npc.speech(Now get out of my sight! I don't want to be standing here talking to you all day, especially not since I just mugged you and everything. That'd be really awkward, wouldn't it? I mean, it's already starting to feel kind of weird the way you haven't left yet, so you really should be thinking about starting to do that right about now. That's a hint, if you didn't pick up on it. What are you waiting for? Run off now before it starts to get awkward!)]

#IF(pc.isBrave()) With the conflict now resolved, you continue on your way, making sure to keep an eye on [npc.name] in case [npc.she] tries following you. Thankfully for [npc.herHim], it looks like [npc.sheIs] more concerned with counting out [npc.her] ill-gotten gains than attempting to make any sort of threatening move, and you soon turn a corner and leave the [npc.race] behind. #ELSEIF(pc.isCowardly()) With the conflict now resolved, you hurry on your way, hoping that [npc.name] doesn't pursue you and demand more money. Quickly retreating around a corner, you thankfully leave the [npc.race] behind, breathing a sigh of relief as you reflect on the fact that you just came close to having a violent confrontation. #ELSE With the conflict now resolved, you continue on your way, giving [npc.name] one last backwards glance to make sure [npc.she] isn't going to follow you. Thankfully, it looks like [npc.sheIs] more concerned with counting out [npc.her] ill-gotten gains than attempting to make any sort of threatening move, and after just a moment, you turn a corner and leave the [npc.race] behind. #ENDIF

Wanting to avoid a fight, and unwilling to hand over any of your money, you decide to do the only other thing you can think of, and flash a seductive smile at [npc.name]. [pc.speech(There's no need to fight. If you're looking for a bit of fun, all you have to do is ask...)]

[npc.speech(Oh really?)] [npc.name] replies, stepping forwards in an intimidating manner. You remain in place, biting your [pc.lip] and trying to make yourself as small as possible as you attempt to entice [npc.name] into using you for some sexual relief.

Much to your delight, your would-be attacker reaches up and grabs you by the [pc.arms], before pulling you forwards into a tight embrace. Pressing [npc.her] [npc.lips] against yours, [npc.she] thrusts [npc.her] [npc.tongue] into your mouth, aggressively kissing you for a moment before pulling back, growling, [npc.speech(You're going to be a good [pc.girl] now, aren't you bitch?)]

Whimpering in the affirmative, you surrender yourself to [npc.namePos] dominant touch, allowing yourself to be used as payment for trespassing on [npc.her] territory...

In your peripheral vision, you suddenly see a figure swooping down towards you from high up above. Turning towards them, you ready yourself for a fight, and within just a moment, the familiar figure of [npc.name] lands just in front of you.

As [npc.she] stands before you, you notice that there's definitely something different about [npc.herHim] this time. The consequence of ejaculating inside of [npc.herHim] is staring you right in the face, and you gulp as you see [npc.herHim] pointing down at [npc.her] [style.colourSex(pregnant belly)].
